NK015(ba)018:0: sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga mun sel zla ba bzhugs so //
NK015(ba)018:1: bla ma he ru ka la na mo /
NK015(ba)018:2: rang bzhin gcig la bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i //
NK015(ba)018:3: gdul byar mthun pa'i 'dul byed thabs ston pa //
NK015(ba)018:4: he ru ka yi go 'phang mngon byed pa //
NK015(ba)018:5: dkyil 'khor cho ga mun sel zla ba spro //
NK015(ba)018:6: he ru ka'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i mos slob
NK015(ba)018:7: pa dag 'jug pa bde ba'i phyir stabs mar bri
NK015(ba)018:9: dngos gzhi mjug gi bya ba gsum /
NK015(ba)018:14: sta gon gyi cho ga bzhi /
NK015(ba)018:16: grangs dus mtshan ma'i bsnyen pa gang rung sngon nas btang zin gyis /
NK015(ba)018:17: 'dir khyad par bsnyen pa kha gso ba ci nus bya /
NK015(ba)018:18: gnyis pa las kyi gzhi bzung bsgrubs pa'i dus kyi phun sum tshogs pa lnga bshad pa ltar te /
NK015(ba)018:19: gtso bor dam sdoms la gnas pa nyid do //
NK015(ba)018:20: gsum pa sa'i cho ga la /
NK015(ba)018:21: thog mar sngar sgrubs kyis byin can nam /
NK015(ba)018:22: gsar du brtag par sa yi dngos grub blang ba'i phyir /
NK015(ba)018:23: dkyil 'khor bsgom par 'dod don gsol te nam mkhar bteg /
NK015(ba)018:24: sa yi bdag po brtan ma la bslang phyir /
NK015(ba)018:26: dri bzang dang ba byung byugs te me tog gi tshom bu dgod /
NK015(ba)018:30: bzhi bsnol gyis bskor te bkod /
NK015(ba)018:33: rtog bral blo 'das brjod med kyi ngang nas /
NK015(ba)018:35: rang nyid skad cig gis khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil
NK015(ba)018:36: pa ljang ser zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa g.yas sna
NK015(ba)018:38: g.yon dril bu dkur brten pa /
NK015(ba)018:39: khro bo'i chas can yum dang bcas pa'i skur gyur /
NK015(ba)018:42: +aahmh'u gis 'dod yon bdud rtsi'i phung por byin gyis brlab la /
NK015(ba)018:43: rang gi thugs ka nas lam yig ser po chad
NK015(ba)018:44: pa man+dala gyi dbus su gnas pa las sa'i lha
NK015(ba)018:45: mo gser gyi mdog can zhi zhing 'dzum pa dar
NK015(ba)018:46: dang rin po ches brgyan pa /
NK015(ba)018:47: g.yas gser gyi bum pa dang /
NK015(ba)018:48: g.yon mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya mdzad pa /
NK015(ba)018:49: phag gi khri la bzhugs shing 'ja' tshon sna lnga'i 'od zer 'phro bar bsam /
NK015(ba)018:50: ye shes lnga'i dbang bskur nas /
NK015(ba)018:51: rnam snang bdag por gyur pa'i rigs lngas dbu brgyan /
NK015(ba)018:52: sku gsung thugs byin gyis rlabs /
NK015(ba)018:53: badz+ra sa ma ya h'u dzah zhes snyan brnan /
NK015(ba)018:55: dad pa dang ni dam tshig gis //
NK015(ba)018:56: tshur gshegs lha mo brtan ma che //
NK015(ba)018:57: mchod yon bzhes nas 'di nyid du //
NK015(ba)018:58: mchod pas bdag la dgyes par mdzod //
NK015(ba)018:59: e h+ya hi ba su d+ha r+ai ma h+aa k+aa ru ni ka dri sh+ya ho /
NK015(ba)018:63: dza h'u bam hohs gnyis med du bstim /
NK015(ba)018:69: i dam b+ha limbtags pas gtor ma phul /
NK015(ba)018:70: sa yi lha mo brtan ma 'og phyogs skyong //
NK015(ba)018:71: sku gser phyag na gser gyi bum pa bsnams /
NK015(ba)018:73: / 'ja' tshon 'od ldan phag chen khri la bzhugs //
NK015(ba)018:74: de la phyag 'tshal bsnyen bskur mchod pa 'bul //
NK015(ba)018:77: zhes brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pas 'dod don stsol ba'i dgyes mdangs phyung bar bsam /
NK015(ba)018:79: sngar bzhin mchod gtor rnams brlab la /
NK015(ba)018:80: s+tha na pa ti k+she tra p+aa la sa p+aa ri wa ra e h+ya hi /
NK015(ba)018:82: a k+aa ro'i sngags kyis gtor ma phul la /
NK015(ba)018:84: ri rab chen po'i gnas dang gling bzhi dang /
NK015(ba)018:85: rgya mtsho'i 'jing gnas gtsug na nor bu 'bar //
NK015(ba)018:86: kun dag'i bdag po dbang byed chen po dang //
NK015(ba)018:87: kun tu sa yi lha mo brtan 'bar ma //
NK015(ba)018:88: sa bdag mthu chen 'khor gyi gnas rnams su //
NK015(ba)018:89: mchod sbyin gtor ma dam pa 'di bsngosa pas //
NK015(ba)018:90: so so 'khor bcas re ba skong gyur nas //
NK015(ba)018:91: bdag gi las 'di'i 'bras bu mchis par mdzod //
NK015(ba)018:93: ya hi gats+tshasa rang gnas gshegs la mchod gtor phyir 'bul /
NK015(ba)018:94: lha mo dpang du gsol ba ni /
NK015(ba)018:95: tri shu la'i phyag rgya sa la lan gsum gtugs te /
NK015(ba)018:97: skyobs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyis //
NK015(ba)018:98: spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par dang //
NK015(ba)018:99: sa dang pha rol phyin pa la //
NK015(ba)018:100: lha mo khyod kyis dpang mdzod cig /
NK015(ba)018:104: lha mo nam mkha' la dpang du bzhugs par bsam /
NK015(ba)018:105: badz+ra sa ma dzahs dbang po'i lha nam mkhar gang ba spyan drangs /
NK015(ba)018:107: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byin bsdus rang la
NK015(ba)018:108: thim pas lus 'od kyi gong bur gyur par bsam
NK015(ba)018:109: / badz+ra ma h+aa sh+r+ai he ru ka h'u /
NK015(ba)018:111: rang nyid zhe sdang rdo rje sku mdog mthing nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa g.yas rdo rje dang /
NK015(ba)018:113: mi bzad pa'i khro bo 'bar ba'i sdang mig gis bgegs la blta ba /
NK015(ba)018:114: rkang mthil dang snying gar h'u las sna tshogs rdo rje me rab tu 'bar bar bsam zhing /
NK015(ba)018:116: sa yi phyogs 'dir rdo rje 'dzin pa bdag gis
NK015(ba)018:117: sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i ye shes
NK015(ba)018:118: kyi 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i ched du sgyu
NK015(ba)018:119: 'phrul d+r+wa ba khro bo'i lhag pa gzugs brnyan gyi
NK015(ba)018:120: dkyil 'khor chen po bzhengs su gsol bas /
NK015(ba)018:121: gang su yang rung ba'i 'byung po gdug pa can
NK015(ba)018:122: g.yog dang 'khor du bcas pa thams cad 'dir ma
NK015(ba)018:123: gnas par gzhan du dengs shig /
NK015(ba)018:124: gal te mi 'gro na de bzhin gshegs pa thams
NK015(ba)018:125: cad kyi thugs gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi
NK015(ba)018:126: rdo rje me rab tu 'bar ba 'dis khyed rnams
NK015(ba)018:127: kyi mgo bo tshal pa brgyar 'gas par 'gyur ta
NK015(ba)018:133: sum+b+ha'i sngags bzla bzhin rdo rje gsor /
NK015(ba)018:137: khro bo rnams slar 'dus nas srung ba'i gur khang
NK015(ba)018:138: sna tshogs rdo rje me rab tu 'bar ba dang
NK015(ba)018:139: bcas pas phyogs mtshams thams cad khyab par bsam la
NK015(ba)018:142: ji ltar che mchog he ru kas //
NK015(ba)018:143: ru tra bdud kyi sde btul nas //
NK015(ba)018:144: chos kyi rgyal srid dpang btsugs pa //
NK015(ba)018:145: de bzhin du ni bdag gis kyang //
NK015(ba)018:146: rgyal bar byas te dkyil 'khor bri //
NK015(ba)018:147: sa yi dngos grub stsal du gsol //
NK015(ba)018:148: rat+na pa sham sid+d+hi ku ru sa ma ya s+t+wam /
NK015(ba)018:149: zhes brjod pas lha mo 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis 'od du zhu nas sa gzhi la thim pas /
NK015(ba)018:150: sa gzhi rin po che'i rang bzhin ye shes lnga'i ngo bor gyur par bsam mo //
NK015(ba)018:151: ji ltar rigs pa'i tshad kyi stegs bu brtsigs pa'i dbus su /
NK015(ba)018:152: zangs sam dmar po'i shing pas phur bu rtse mo
NK015(ba)018:153: la gam gyi gzugs bcos pa snod 'bras bus bkang
NK015(ba)018:154: bar btsugs la / pad+ma k+ai li k+ai la ya phata dzahbarjoda pas /
NK015(ba)018:155: rang gi snying kha'i h'u las pad+ma he ru ka dmar po zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa /
NK015(ba)018:156: dang po gnyis kyis pad+ma dang zhags pa /
NK015(ba)018:157: 'og ma gnyis kyi phur bu sgril ba /
NK015(ba)018:158: smad phur bu zla gam rab tu 'bar ba'i rtse
NK015(ba)018:159: mo can du phyung ba bkod pa'i phur bu dbyer
NK015(ba)018:160: med du gyur / k+aa ya badz+rasogs kyis sku gsung
NK015(ba)018:161: thugs byin brlabs te gzi byin ldan pa byas te
NK015(ba)018:163: pad+ma dbang gi khro mchog chags pa'i sku //
NK015(ba)018:164: ma lus dbang du sdud pa'i las mdzad pa /
NK015(ba)018:166: / 'dzam gling ye shes rin chen sa 'di dag /
NK015(ba)018:167: bdag gi byang chub grogs su 'gyur bar mdzod //
NK015(ba)018:168: pad+ma k+ai li k+ai la ya wa sham ma na ye h'u /
NK015(ba)018:169: wa sham ku ru s+w+aa h+aa /
NK015(ba)018:170: brjod bzhin dkyil 'khor gyi gzhi la btab pas /
NK015(ba)018:171: phur bu las byung ba'i 'od kyis sa gzhi thams
NK015(ba)018:172: cad khyab cing bdag gi dbang du gyur par bsam
NK015(ba)018:173: mo // rang gi lag pa g.yas kyi sor mo
NK015(ba)018:174: lnga la nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor re re'i steng du
NK015(ba)018:175: h'u mthing ga re res mtshan pa yongs su gyur
NK015(ba)018:176: pa las rdo rje rtse lnga pa h'u gis mtshan
NK015(ba)018:177: mo // par bsam la / badz+ra ha na ha na kro d+ha h'u phata /
NK015(ba)018:178: ces brjod bzhin sa la lan gsum bsnun pas /
NK015(ba)018:179: rdo rje dang h'u gi 'od kyis sa'i nyes skyon
NK015(ba)018:180: thams cad sbyangs nas ye shes rang snang gi gzhir
NK015(ba)018:181: gyur par bsam / sngags dang phyag rgyas sbyangs ba'o //
NK015(ba)018:182: sa dang sa 'dzin pa'i 'khrul rtog thams cad stong
NK015(ba)018:183: nyid de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings su rnam par dag
NK015(ba)018:184: par bsam / ma h+aa shu nya ta dz+ny+aa na badz+ra swa b+h+aa wa +aat+ma ko&a ham /
NK015(ba)018:185: ting 'dzin dmigs med kyis sbyangs ba'o //
NK015(ba)018:188: rang rig skad cig gis h'u las rdo rje sngon
NK015(ba)018:189: po h'u yig mthing nag 'bar bas mtshan par gyur
NK015(ba)018:190: / de las e yam ram sum kem ram b+h+r+aum rnams 'og tu chad /
NK015(ba)018:193: 'phro 'dus yongs su gyur pa las 'byung lnga rim brtsegs kyi steng du /
NK015(ba)018:194: b+h+r+aum bi shwa bi shud+d+he dz+ny+aa na tsakra man+dala /
NK015(ba)018:195: zhes brjod pas ye shes rin po che'i rang bzhin
NK015(ba)018:196: b+hany+dza 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor ji ltar 'byung bar 'gyur
NK015(ba)018:197: ba bzhin du bkra lam gyis gsal bar bsam mo
NK015(ba)018:199: badz+ra sh+r+ai he ru ka h'u /
NK015(ba)018:200: badz+ra kro ti shwa ri s+t+wam /
NK015(ba)018:202: rang nyid skad cig gis dpal rdo rje khrag 'thung chen po'i skur gyur pa ni /
NK015(ba)018:206: mkha' gsang brlab nas mnyam sbyor gyis sras kyi lha sum cu spro ba dang /
NK015(ba)018:207: dbang mo bskyed pa rnams sgrub thabs ltar /
NK015(ba)018:208: gzhan sras kyi cho gas gsal btab la /
NK015(ba)018:209: byang chub sems kyi 'od zer gyis dkyil 'khor ba
NK015(ba)018:210: dang bcas pa'i dus gsum gyi mgon po sras dang
NK015(ba)018:211: bcas pa thams cad mkha' khyab tu sad par bsam
NK015(ba)018:212: zhing / ru lu ru lu h'u b+h+yo h'u gis snyan bsnan /
NK015(ba)018:213: e h+ya his spyan drangs la /
NK015(ba)018:216: bzhi bsnol sogs phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa rnams kyis mchod cing bstod par bya'o //
NK015(ba)018:217: de nas phyogs bzhi'i slob ma bzhi /
NK015(ba)018:225: de rnams rang rang gis gtso bo la /
NK015(ba)018:228: bzhi bsnol gyis mchod pa sngon du 'gro bas /
NK015(ba)018:230: zhi ba'i ye shes rang snang ba'i //
NK015(ba)018:231: rgyan rnams kun gyi rab mdzes pa //
NK015(ba)018:232: sangs rgyas kun gyi sku yi mchog /
NK015(ba)018:233: dkyil khor chen po gsung du gsol //
NK015(ba)018:235: yon tan rin chen 'byung ba'i gtso //
NK015(ba)018:236: ma lus kun gyi re skong ba //
NK015(ba)018:237: sangs rgyas kun gyi yon tan mchog /
NK015(ba)018:238: dkyil 'khor chen po gsung du gsol //
NK015(ba)018:240: rang bzhin dag pas gos pa med /
NK015(ba)018:242: / 'dod chags pha rol phyin pa brnyes //
NK015(ba)018:243: sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung gi mchog /
NK015(ba)018:244: dkyil 'khor chen po gsung du gsol //
NK015(ba)018:246: bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs pas //
NK015(ba)018:247: thams cad sgrol ba'i ded dpon mchog /
NK015(ba)018:248: sangs rgyas kun gyi phrin las bdag /
NK015(ba)018:249: dkyil 'khor chen po gsung du gsol //
NK015(ba)018:250: thams cad kyis thun mong du /
NK015(ba)018:251: bsod nams ye shes tshogs rdzogs shing //
NK015(ba)018:252: rang rig mtha' dbus med pa'i dkyil //
NK015(ba)018:254: dkyil 'khor snying po bshad du gsol //
NK015(ba)018:257: gcig gis kyang phyogs de dag tu song nas bya'o //
NK015(ba)018:258: de'ang med na sgom pas rung ngo //
NK015(ba)018:259: slob dpon gyis rdor rdil bcas /
NK015(ba)018:260: mi phyed pa'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas /
NK015(ba)018:262: nga ni sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag /
NK015(ba)018:264: dbang mchog sgrub pa'i las byed kyis //
NK015(ba)018:265: bgegs rnams thams cad gzhan du dengs //
NK015(ba)018:267: thugs ka'i h'u las khro bo'i sprin mi bzad par spro zhing /
NK015(ba)018:268: rkang mthil gnyis su h'u las 'bar ba'i rdo rje re res mtshan par bsam la /
NK015(ba)018:271: h'u bzhi ba'i drag sngags sgrogs te dbang ldan nas brtsams /
NK015(ba)018:272: rdo rje'i 'gros kyis g.yas su skor /
NK015(ba)018:273: dkyil 'khor gyi gzhi cis kyang mi shigs pa rdo rje'i rang bzhin du brtan par bsam /
NK015(ba)018:276: mtshon cha'i char de dag tshur 'dus pa lassogs nas /
NK015(ba)018:279: slar yang thugs ka nas ma bcu spros srung 'khor nang phyogs bcur bab pa nyi gdan du gyur /
NK015(ba)018:280: khro bo 'dod pa'i rgyal po spros /
NK015(ba)018:281: phyogs bcu'i bgegs rnams bkugs te nyi gdan rnams kyi
NK015(ba)018:282: steng du myos shing 'gyel stabs su 'khod par gyur
NK015(ba)018:283: / slar yang rang gi thugs ka nas khro bo bcu phyungs te /
NK015(ba)018:284: mdun du bkod pa'i phur bu rnams dang gnyis su med par gyur pa ni /
NK015(ba)018:286: badz+ra kro ta h'u ka ra h'u gardza gardza h'u phata /
NK015(ba)018:288: badz+ra kro d+ha a mri ta kun+da li h'u tshin+d+ha tshin+d+ha h'u phata /
NK015(ba)018:289: lnga pa g.yas bskor gyi gdab tshul /
NK015(ba)018:292: badz+ra kro d+ha tri lo kya b+ti dza ya h'u bin+d+ha bin+d+ha h'u phata /
NK015(ba)018:294: badz+ra kro d+ha a pa ra tsi ta h'u tish+tha tish+tha h'u phata /
NK015(ba)018:296: badz+ra kro d+ha +aar+ya a tsa la h'u b+han+d+ha b+han+d+ha h'u phata /
NK015(ba)018:298: badz+ra kro d+ha ni la dan+da h'u da ha da ha h'u phata /
NK015(ba)018:300: badz+ra kro d+ha ma h+aa b+ha la h'u s+pho ta s+pho ta h'u phata /
NK015(ba)018:301: zhes brjod pas khro bo bcur gyur te /
NK015(ba)018:303: thams cad kyang sku mdog mthing nag /
NK015(ba)018:304: zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa tho ba dang lcags kyu 'dzin pa /
NK015(ba)018:305: smad phur bu 'bar ba'i rnam pa can du gyur /
NK015(ba)018:306: khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa tho ba thog pa spros te /
NK015(ba)018:307: g+ha g+ha g+h+aa ta ya g+h+aa ta ya sarba dush+tana
NK015(ba)018:308: phatah k+ai la ya k+ai la ya sarba pa pam
NK015(ba)018:309: phata / h'u h'u h'uh badz+ra k+ai la ya /
NK015(ba)018:310: badz+ra d+ha ro a dz+ny+aa pa ya ti sarba big+h+n+aana
NK015(ba)018:311: k+aa ya w+aak+ka tsit+ta badz+ra k+ai la ya h'u phata
NK015(ba)018:312: / lan gsum brjod pas btab la /
NK015(ba)018:313: khro bo rnams phyogs bcu'i bgegs la phur bu'i tshul
NK015(ba)018:314: du btab pas lus phug ste g.yo 'gul med par
NK015(ba)018:315: byas / de rnams las sprul pa dang yang sprul
NK015(ba)018:316: mtshon cha sna tshogs pa'i sprin spro bas cis kyang
NK015(ba)018:321: 'og gi phur bu nub tu gdab bo //
NK015(ba)018:322: don dam stong nyid nam mkha' lta bu dmigs su
NK015(ba)018:323: ma grub cing blo bral ye shes skyongs pas de
NK015(ba)018:324: kho na nyid kyis srung ba'o //
NK015(ba)018:325: de dag ni nub dang po'i bya ba'o //
NK015(ba)018:326: bzhi pa sta gon cho ga la /
NK015(ba)018:327: rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi byang shar du khru dod pa'i man+dala dris byugs la /
NK015(ba)018:328: sna tshogs pad+ma 'dab brgyad rdo rwa bcas bris pa'i /
NK015(ba)018:329: dbus su las bum ches ldan rgya gram gyi mtshan pa can /
NK015(ba)018:330: shar du ye shes dang las kyi thig skud /
NK015(ba)018:332: nub tu thod chu bdud rtsi lnga ldan /
NK015(ba)018:335: mtshams kyis pad 'dab bzhi la rdul tshon lnga mdog
NK015(ba)018:336: rigs sdebs par dpa' bo 'bru lnga bris pa bkod
NK015(ba)018:337: / mthar mchod gtor spyi ltar bshams /
NK015(ba)018:338: bdag gi rnal 'byor bzlas pa'i bar sngon du btang ste /
NK015(ba)018:342: stong pa'i ngang las b+h+r+aum las byang ba'i rin po
NK015(ba)018:343: che'i bum pa mtshan nyid thams cad yongs su rdzogs
NK015(ba)018:344: pa'i nang du nyi ma'i gdan la h'u las sna
NK015(ba)018:345: tshogs rdo rje h'u gis mtshan pa yongs su gyur
NK015(ba)018:346: pa las / h'u big+ha n+aan+ta krita phata /
NK015(ba)018:347: ces brjod pas khro bo mi 'chi thabs sbyor ljang
NK015(ba)018:348: nag rgya gram dang dril bu 'dzin pa'i skur gyur
NK015(ba)018:349: par bsam la / las rigs bdag por gyur pas dbang bskur /
NK015(ba)018:350: sku gsung thugs byin gyis rlabs /
NK015(ba)018:351: badz+ra sa ma dzahs snyan gsan dbab /
NK015(ba)018:353: k+aa ya wak+ka tsit+ta badz+rasa brtan par byas /
NK015(ba)018:357: rdo rje rtse gcig rgyas la bum pa la reg bzhin /
NK015(ba)018:359: ces brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa'i mthar /
NK015(ba)018:360: lha 'od du zhu nas ye shes kyi bdud rtsi'i rgya mtshor 'khyil bar bsam zhing /
NK015(ba)018:361: bum chu 'thor yab kyis blang ste /
NK015(ba)018:362: swa b+h+aa wa bi shud+d+ha d+har+m+aa t+aa badz+ra sid+d+hi h'u /
NK015(ba)018:364: bdag gnas yo byad thams cad la gtor bas nyes skyon dag par bsam mo //
NK015(ba)018:365: de ni bsang gtor bya ba kun gyi don no //
NK015(ba)018:368: rdo rje dril bu'i rab gnas ni /
NK015(ba)018:372: stong pa'i ngang las rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i lte ba la dpal chen po /
NK015(ba)018:373: yar gyi rwa lnga la khrag 'thung rigs lnga /
NK015(ba)018:374: mar gyi rwa lnga la rigs kyi yum lnga /
NK015(ba)018:375: yas mas kyi pad+ma brgyad la gnas ma brgyad dang /
NK015(ba)018:377: dril bu'i lte ba dang pad+ma'i 'dab ma brgyad kyi phyogs bzhir rigs kyi yum lnga /
NK015(ba)018:378: mtshams bzhi gsang ba'i yum bzhi /
NK015(ba)018:379: zhal shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma dang /
NK015(ba)018:380: rtse mo'i rdo rje khrag 'thung rigs lnga rnams kyi skur bskyed pa /
NK015(ba)018:388: h'u +aa zhes pas lha rnams 'od du zhu /
NK015(ba)018:391: zhes brjod pas rdo rje thabs kyi rang bzhin ye shes lnga'i ngo bo dang /
NK015(ba)018:392: dril bu shes rab kyi rang bzhin stong nyid chos kyi sgra dbyangs sgrogs pa /
NK015(ba)018:393: gnyis ka'ang don dam pa'i byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin du mos pa brtan par byas la /
NK015(ba)018:395: rdo rje dril bu rig pa 'dzin //
NK015(ba)018:396: thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i /
NK015(ba)018:399: chos la de bzhin dbang sgyur shog /
NK015(ba)018:406: stongs pa'i ngang las dam rdzas kyi steng du h'u
NK015(ba)018:407: ha hi phata b+h+yo las khrag 'thung rol pa'i dkyil
NK015(ba)018:408: 'khor gyi 'khor lo thams cad gsal bar gyur pa
NK015(ba)018:417: h'u zhes brjod pas 'od du zhu ba ye shes kyi bdud rtsir 'khyil bar bsam mo //
NK015(ba)018:419: skabs 'dir thig tshon thun mong du bya ste /
NK015(ba)018:422: stong pa'i ngang las ye shes kyi thig skud dar
NK015(ba)018:423: tshon sna lnga so so'i steng du nyi zla la
NK015(ba)018:424: gnas pa'i h'u zung lnga dang /
NK015(ba)018:425: dam tshig thig skud kyi steng du nyi zla la gnas pa'i h'u zung gsum gsal bar gyur /
NK015(ba)018:428: 'phro 'dus so so'i phyag mtshan sa bon gyis mtshon pa rnams yongs su gyur pa las /
NK015(ba)018:429: khrag 'thung rigs lnga dang rigs gsum rang rang gi yum dang bcas pa'i skur gyur /
NK015(ba)018:437: h'u zhes brjod pas lha rnams 'od du zhu nas thig tshon so so la thim par bsam /
NK015(ba)018:438: slar yang thugs ka'i h'u las 'od zer 'phros pas
NK015(ba)018:439: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mdun gyi nam mkhar
NK015(ba)018:440: spyan drangs la / rdo rje gsor bzhin du /
NK015(ba)018:442: mi gnas ye shes chen po'i bdag /
NK015(ba)018:443: phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i de bzhin gshegs //
NK015(ba)018:444: thams cad gsan cing dgongs su gsol //
NK015(ba)018:445: rdo rje 'dzin pa bdag gis ni /
NK015(ba)018:447: / 'jigs byed chen po he ru ka'i //
NK015(ba)018:449: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis //
NK015(ba)018:450: bdag la mthu dang byin rlabs stsol //
NK015(ba)018:451: bdag la rdo rje ye shes kyi //
NK015(ba)018:452: thig mtshon dngos grub stsal du gsol //
NK015(ba)018:454: rang gi mig gnyis dza yig las skyes pa'i nyi zlar bsam la /
NK015(ba)018:455: dip+ta drish+ta gu h+ya dz+ny+aa na dza dzah zhes rdzi
NK015(ba)018:456: ma bskyod pa 'bar ba'i lta stangs kyis bskul bas
NK015(ba)018:457: nam mkha'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sbyor ba mdzad
NK015(ba)018:458: par mos te / shu nya ta sogs ye shes lnga'i sngags rnams brjod pas /
NK015(ba)018:459: de rnams kyi thugs ka nas ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin gyi 'od zer kha dog lngar byung /
NK015(ba)018:460: ye shes kyi thig skud dang tshon so so la
NK015(ba)018:461: thim pas de nyid ye shes lnga'i ngo bor gyur
NK015(ba)018:462: par bsam zhing / 'bru lnga brjod bzhin par slob ma dang bcas /
NK015(ba)018:463: dang po srad bu lnga tshan re re nas sgril /
NK015(ba)018:464: de nas gcig tu sgril te brdog nas snod du bzhag /
NK015(ba)018:466: k+aa ya badz+ra sogs sku gsung thugs kyi sngags gsum brjod pas /
NK015(ba)018:467: nam mkha'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi gnas gsum
NK015(ba)018:468: nas rdo rje gsum gyi rang bzhin gyi 'od zer
NK015(ba)018:470: dam tshig thig skud so so la thim pas de
NK015(ba)018:471: nyid sku gsung thugs kyi ngo bor gyur par bsam
NK015(ba)018:472: zhing / 'bru gsum brjod bzhin du so sor sgril /
NK015(ba)018:473: slar gcig tu sgril snon du bzhag /
NK015(ba)018:475: +aahsarba pany+tsa rat+na sa ma ye h'u h'u h'u /
NK015(ba)018:476: zhes bzlas pas rin po che'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul tshon 'bar bar bsam /
NK015(ba)018:477: bris pa'i yig 'bru rnams kyang mi mngon par spungs /
NK015(ba)018:478: rnam rgyal bum pa lhag gnas ni /
NK015(ba)018:479: rnam rgyal rigs lnga'am lha grangs /
NK015(ba)018:480: gsang bum kho na la bsdu ste /
NK015(ba)018:481: pho mo'i thod pa mtshan ldan kha sbyor ba'i nang du /
NK015(ba)018:491: a pa ra tsi ste sman lnga /
NK015(ba)018:496: mu men te rin po che lnga /
NK015(ba)018:507: bdud rtsi lnga bsnan pas sum cu po btab /
NK015(ba)018:508: dar mthing dmar gyis bcings shing lcang los brgyan pa /
NK015(ba)018:511: las bum sgo'i nang rol gyi g.yas sam /
NK015(ba)018:515: stong pa'i ngang las b+h+r+aum las byung ba'i bum pa
NK015(ba)018:516: mtshan nyid thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i nang du
NK015(ba)018:517: ye shes rin po che'i rang bzhin b+hany+dza 'bar ba'i
NK015(ba)018:518: gzhal yas khang gdan dang bcas pa gsal bar bsam
NK015(ba)018:519: la / rang rang gi gdan la h'u zungs lnga dang /
NK015(ba)018:523: b+h+yo nyi shu rtsa brgyad rnams gnas par gyur /
NK015(ba)018:527: so so'i sa bon gyis mtshan pa rnams su gyur /
NK015(ba)018:530: slar yang 'phro 'dus yongs su gyur pa las /
NK015(ba)018:532: bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po badz+ra he ru
NK015(ba)018:533: ka la sogs te lnga bcu rtsa brgyad khrag 'thung
NK015(ba)018:534: rol pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo thams cad yongs
NK015(ba)018:535: su rdzogs par gyur par bsam la /
NK015(ba)018:544: bdag gi zhal nas sngags kyi phreng ba byung gzungs
NK015(ba)018:545: thag la 'khril te song bas bum pa'i lha rnams
NK015(ba)018:547: snyoms par zhugs pa'i byang sems ye shes kyi bdud
NK015(ba)018:548: rtsi bab pas bum pa gang bar bsam zhing lha
NK015(ba)018:549: so so'i rtsa sngags gtso 'khor gyi 'gros sbyar ba
NK015(ba)018:551: taste taste ma h+aa taste s+w+aa h+aa /
NK015(ba)018:552: zhes thod chu bum nang du phul bas /
NK015(ba)018:553: lha thams cad chags pa chen pos ye shes kyi
NK015(ba)018:554: bdud rtsir zhu ba bum chu dang ro gcig tu
NK015(ba)018:556: bdug spos kyis bdug par bya'o //
NK015(ba)018:560: sgrubs chen la dngos grub kyi dbang blang ba rnams la 'di nyid dgos kyis /
NK015(ba)018:561: sgrub mchod tsam la ma byas kyang chog go //
NK015(ba)018:562: slob ma lhag gnas ni gzhan du shes so //
NK015(ba)018:563: de nas lha lhag gnas la /
NK015(ba)018:564: bum pa bsal la las bum gyi chus dkyil 'khor gyi gzhi la bsang gtor bya la /
NK015(ba)018:567: badz+ra s+au tra sa ma ya ma ti kra ma h'u phata /
NK015(ba)018:568: thig bskor bcas nam mkhar btab pas /
NK015(ba)018:569: 'dri bar 'gyur ba'i dkyil 'khor nam mkha' la gsal bar gyur par bsam /
NK015(ba)018:570: dam tshig thig skud dri zhim po'i thig chal las phyungs pa lung bzhin du btab ste /
NK015(ba)018:571: mkha' khyab kyi rgyal ba rnams sad cing ye shes
NK015(ba)018:572: kyi thig dam tshig gi thig la ro mnyam du
NK015(ba)018:574: thig skud kyi ye shes pa la /
NK015(ba)018:578: tshom bu'i rgyu sta gon gyis /
NK015(ba)018:579: dkyil 'khor gyi gnas su rang nyid gtso bo yab
NK015(ba)018:580: yum mnyam par sbyor ba'i sems sprin las b+h+r+aum 'phros
NK015(ba)018:581: te gzhal yas khang gi mtshan nyid thams cad yongs
NK015(ba)018:583: rang rang gi rtsa sngags la /
NK015(ba)018:584: ma ni pad+ma ye s+w+aa h+aa /
NK015(ba)018:586: byang sems dkar dmar tsan+dana dang sbyar ba'i thig le gtso bo'i gnas su gru bzhi /
NK015(ba)018:587: gzhan rnams zlum po byas la /
NK015(ba)018:588: me tog gi tshom bu dgod /
NK015(ba)018:589: de'i nang du lha rang rang gi gdan rnams gsal ba la /
NK015(ba)018:590: bdag nyid dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su nyi zla'i gdan gtso bo yab yum gyi skur gyur pa la /
NK015(ba)018:595: snyoms par zhugs pa'i byang chub kyi sems sprin sku'i
NK015(ba)018:596: dbyibs brgyud rdo rje'i lam nas yum gyi pad+mora spros
NK015(ba)018:597: pa lnga bcu rtsa brgyad khrag 'thung rol pa'i dkyil
NK015(ba)018:598: 'khor gyi 'khor lo rdzogs pa rnams rang rang gi
NK015(ba)018:599: gnas ji lta bar bzhugs par bsam la /
NK015(ba)018:600: smug nag sngo nag sogs kyis gsal btab /
NK015(ba)018:609: rgyal ba gang bzhugs 'khor dang bcas //
NK015(ba)018:610: mgon po dam can ji snyed pa //
NK015(ba)018:611: thams cad kun nas dgongs su gsol //
NK015(ba)018:612: sras bcas thabs cig gshegs nas kyang //
NK015(ba)018:613: sa gzhi yongs su bzung bar mdzod //
NK015(ba)018:614: badz+ra kro d+ha sa ma ya s+t+wam /
NK015(ba)018:615: zhes gsol ba btab pas lha thams cad dgyes par
NK015(ba)018:616: rol pa'i gzi byin mtha' yas pa de nyid du
NK015(ba)018:617: thim pas thams cad dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin du
NK015(ba)018:618: gsal bar bsam pa ni nub gnyis pa'i bya ba'o
NK015(ba)018:619: // tshon sna lnga 'byung rigs sdebs pas m+aum t+aamsogs brjod /
NK015(ba)018:622: g.yas pa'i mtheb srin gyis tshon rtsi lnga cung zad re blangs pa g.yon pa'i mthil du bzhag /
NK015(ba)018:623: +aahsarba pany+tsa rat+na sa ma ye h'u h'u h'u /
NK015(ba)018:625: g.yas pa'i sor mo lnga la nyi ma'i steng du yab kyi 'bru lnga /
NK015(ba)018:626: g.yon pa'i sor mo lnga la zla ba'i steng du yum gyi 'bru lnga gsal bar gyur pa'i /
NK015(ba)018:627: g.yas pa'i sor mo lnga tshoms kyis g.yon pa'i tshon rtsi khung bu'i stengs bkod la /
NK015(ba)018:628: don ye shes rin po che'i rang bzhin rtags keng
NK015(ba)018:629: rus chen po'i ri rab tu gyur par mos te
NK015(ba)018:630: / pany+tsa re kh+aas tshon pra brtags pa sogs kyang gsungs so //
NK015(ba)018:632: tshon dgye tshul sogs ni ma bris so //
NK015(ba)018:635: gshegs gsol byas te gtsang sar bzhag /
NK015(ba)018:637: spos rol gyis drangs pa'i gsang bum dbus su khri'u la bzhag pa'i mthar /
NK015(ba)018:638: rgyan dang yo byad mchod tshogs rnams bsod nams ma
NK015(ba)018:639: yin pa'i las dang ma 'brel bar mthong rgyud phyag
NK015(ba)018:640: len ma nyams par dgram mo //
NK015(ba)018:641: gnyis pa dngos gzhi dkyil 'khor sgrubs pa ni /
NK015(ba)018:642: sgrub thabs rdo rje rtse brgya pa las bstan pa'i /
NK015(ba)018:643: sngon dngos rjes kyi rim pa ma nor zhing /
NK015(ba)018:645: dad brtson drag pos 'bad par bya'o //
NK015(ba)018:647: kho bo'i zhi dkyil ltar la 'don pa sgyur zhing /
NK015(ba)018:650: ras bris la brtan bzhugs dang /
NK015(ba)018:652: khyed kyi sems can don kun sogs kyi mthar /
NK015(ba)018:653: dz+ny+aa na man+dala badz+ra muhs gshegs te /
NK015(ba)018:658: rol mo'i sgra dang bcas pas /
NK015(ba)018:659: a k+aa ro'i sngags bzlas zhing /
NK015(ba)018:660: rdo rje dang bcas pa'i lag gis thog mar lha tshoms bsdus te mgor bkod /
NK015(ba)018:661: lhag ma dbang ldan phyogs nas gtso bo'i gnas kyi bar phyags la /
NK015(ba)018:662: bum pa la sogs snod bzang por blugs /
NK015(ba)018:663: mchod pa dang bskur bsti chen pos chu klung du dor /
NK015(ba)018:664: slar yang snod chus bkang nas nang du 'ong ste dkyil 'khor khang pa rnams la bsangs gtor bya'o //
NK015(ba)018:666: kam rgyas 'og gi phur bu nas bzungs te phyungs /
NK015(ba)018:667: spyan ma'i sngags bzlas pa'i 'o mas phur rtse bkru zhing /
NK015(ba)018:669: bgegs rnams bde stong gi ngo bor sangs rgyas par bsam nas /
NK015(ba)018:674: de lta bus grub 'bras rgyud gzhung las bstan ltar shes par bya ba nyid do //
NK015(ba)018:675: he ru ka yi dkyil 'khor nyid //
NK015(ba)018:676: sgrub thabs mun sel zla ba 'dis //
NK015(ba)018:677: kahmatshana bla ma'i dgongs rgyan dang //
NK015(ba)018:678: sgrub bstan dar rgyas nub med shog /
NK015(ba)018:679: de mthus gsang ba'i bstan pa 'di //
NK015(ba)018:680: phyogs dus kun tu rgyas pa dang //
NK015(ba)018:681: yid can sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba che'i //
NK015(ba)018:682: dkyil 'khor gcig tu sangs rgyas shog /
NK015(ba)018:684: gter chen mtshungs bla kun bral bka' drin can de'i
NK015(ba)018:685: chog sgrigs la gzhi byas te nyung ngur bsdus pa
NK015(ba)018:686: 'di ni bi dza'i ming gis gyis gnas mchog shing
NK015(ba)018:687: sgo gangs kyi rwa ba'i cha nus chen ri khrod
